text: Revúca (; ) is a town in the Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia. It is the capital of the Revúca District. == Twin towns == Revúca is twinned with: * Kazincbarcika, Hungary * Lędziny, Poland * Litovel, Czech Republic * Uster, Switzerland == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Banská Bystrica Region
title: Revúca
